entry.title: ibnHatab/env-at-picon
entry.summary:
Development environment on Linux

  1. Requirements: ipython bash-completion

  2. Link or copy following files to the $HOME bin/ - some common scripts apps/ - toolchain and emacs configs .bash_profile - toolchain defs .bashrc .bash_aliases .emacs - emacs config .erlang - erlang config .inputrc - ? .vimrc - vim config for trace reading :ic and :mounse

You can adapt this command to do the job for you: for i in find env/ -maxdepth 1 | sed -e '1d' | grep -v .git; do ln -sf $i; done

  1. Get Erlang test tools

mkdir libs; cd libs git clone gitolite@caprica:femto/femto_test git config --global http.proxy $http_proxy rebar get-deps rebar compile

cd deps; git clone https://github.com/stesla/distel.git cd distel; mkdir ebin; make erl

edit .erlabg
